mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchaseorder (postate, pocode, clientid, itemid, pocnt, ordersdate, updatedate, ordersduedate, membercode) VALUES (#{postate}, #{pocode}, #{clientid}, #{itemid}, #{pocnt}, #{ordersdate}, #{updatedate}, #{ordersduedate}, #{membercode})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM purchaseorder po JOIN item ON po.itemid = item.itemid JOIN client cli ON po.clientid = cli.clientid
